title: disconnect in champselect
body:
i have this issue for aprox. 3-4 days now.

i cannot pick my champ because the game doesnt react to it (or ban one) -> after time limit is up i get the "trying to reconnect" popup for a few seconds, befor the champselect will be left resulting in a "there was a problem selecting your champ" message - including a 30 minute Que ban

no other programs open besides LoL
no firewall issue

replies.body: It looks like your network is crapping out and losing sync with champion select, resulting in that error and getting left behind.  It sucks because this can cause you to get an escalated [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) timer.  My suggestion would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  It does have some steps like double checking your firewall, but additional instructions to make sure everything runs smoothly.  Let me know if you have any questions!
